TopicTitle: Craft seems to randomly tip over

Articles.Content:
I was trying to replicate the Falcon 9R By using a propulsive landing. So I tested it, and it was a success. However, the craft seems to want to tip over randomly. It may be that the landing gear is on advanced canards that are turned backwards, but i don't know. It looks like this.

Thanks!

Edited June 5, 2014 by Uberlyuber
If the landing gear are attached to the canards, try locking the canards so they don't move.
Looks like the landing gear aren't holding up under all that weight. They might manage if you burn off all the fuel or lock the suspension.

If your ship is doing this, you need more landing legs.

And I advice against canards, they can make your ship unstable. You need to be able to go both ways (top first, bottom first) through atmosphere with such ship and while canards are very useful for the top first phase, they may make the bottom first part quite challenging.

lock the suspension.

That.

OR

More landing legs.
